characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a white van, driver of a motorcycle
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is seen ahead, followed by a white van and a motorcycle. The white sedan suddenly accelerates and crashes into a pole on the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while navigating through traffic. The white sedan ahead suddenly accelerates and crashes into a pole, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate to avoid potential debris.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, suddenly accelerates and crashes into a pole. 2) Right: A white van, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining its lane. 3) Right: A motorcycle, approximately 3 meters away, moving steadily.

characters: Driver of a white van, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a narrow urban road. A white van is ahead, moving slowly. On the right side, a motorcyclist is stationary near a shop entrance. The motorcyclist appears to be preparing to move.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a slow speed due to the narrow road and the presence of the white van ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the van and monitoring the motorcyclist on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white van, approximately 5 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 3 meters away, stationary but potentially about to move.

characters: Woman in pink dress, white car ahead
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. A woman in a pink dress is standing on the right side of the road, and a white car is parked ahead on the left side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the white car parked ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the woman standing on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A woman in a pink dress, approximately 2 meters away, standing still. 2) Left side: A white car, approximately 10 meters away, parked on the roadside.
